config.boringtweaks.title: Boring Tweaks Config
config.boringtweaks.reduce_volume_while_: Reduces the volume while not focused on this window
config.boringtweaks.smooth_day_cycle.too: Adds smooth transitions on Sun/Moon's movement
Makes the sliders in "Music and Sound Options" make noise when adjusted
config.boringtweaks.dynamic_sound_slider: The noise from sliders in "Music and Sound Options" will be dynamic
config.boringtweaks.bigger_baby_villager: Increases the size of Baby Villagers' head
config.boringtweaks.fix_baby_hat_layer.t: Fixes the hat layer of baby bipeds
config.boringtweaks.shadowed_debug_hud.t: Adds shadows on the debug HUD's text
config.boringtweaks.reduced_volume_perce: The percentage applied by the "Reduce Volume While Away" tweak
config.boringtweaks.smooth_day_cycle_mul: The multiplier used by the "Smooth Day Cycle" tweak
config.boringtweaks.baby_villager_head_s: The scale used by the "Bigger Baby Villager Heads" tweak
config.boringtweaks.noisy_sound_slider_s: Used by "Noisy Sound Slider" to reduce noise
